function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within commercial buildings due to changes in job dynamics and procedures.","Impact":"Increased risk of infections and outbreaks within buildings, leading to health and safety concerns for occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, ventilation improvements, and social distancing measures.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems with high-efficiency filters, contactless technologies for building access and services.","People":"Occupants of commercial buildings, employees, visitors, customers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, employers."},{"Description":"Uncertainty regarding long-lasting consequences of the COVID-19 pandemic on building specifications and design.","Impact":"Risk of inadequate or ineffective responses to future disease outbreaks, leading to continued vulnerability of building occupants.","Mitigation":"Conducting research into the long-term effects of the pandemic on building design and developing flexible, adaptable building solutions.","Technologies":"Digital health monitoring systems, flexible building layouts, adaptable HVAC systems.","People":"Architects, engineers, building designers, public health experts.","Owner":"Industry associations, government bodies, building developers."}]}
